name: rewrap
description: Hard word wrapping for comments and other text at a given column.

commands.title: Rewrap: Toggle Auto-Wrap for Current Document

rewrap.wrappingColumn.description: Controls after how many characters text is wrapped.

rewrap.doubleSentenceSpacing.description: When wrapping lines that end in a period, adds two spaces after that sentence in the wrapped text.

rewrap.wholeComment.description: With the cursor inside a comment block, wrap the whole comment block instead of just a single paragraph.

rewrap.reformat.description: (EXPERIMENTAL) When wrapping lines, reformat paragraph indents.

rewrap.autoWrap.enabled.description: Wraps automatically when the cursor is past the wrapping column.

rewrap.autoWrap.notification.description: Notification type for when auto-wrap is on/off for the current document.
enumDescriptions: Shows permanently when auto-wrap is on in the current document; hidden when it is off
Shows briefly the auto-wrap state for the current document, only when it is toggled on/off manually via the command
